content: doc the voodoo doll materials 4 5mm hook - 5mm hook for hat & jacket worsted weight yarn - color of choice for head/body/limbs black for stitches dark color for hat & jacket contrasting color for stitches two buttons for eyes felt in three colors for heart mouth & eye patches - plus a fourth color for the optional skull on the hat embroidery floss or crochet thread in a contrasting color for sewing on felt pieces the finished doll stands about 9 5 tall
